name: Avoid! (Jam)
description:
Avoid! Collectables! Enemies! Blue and square Trampolines!

Everything! Except the ground, I guess.

A platformer about avoiding everything, inspired by the Sonic 1 ROM Hack "Sonic Omochao Edition".

Kinda a mess, and not really play-tested, but it works.

- Made for the My First Game Jam Summer 2021 session.
